sentences.en: She recast her lecture as a radio talk.
sentences.cn: 她把讲稿修改成了一篇广播讲话。

sentences.en: Stoppard had to recast four of the principal roles.
sentences.cn: 斯托帕德不得不更换4个主要角色的人选。

sentences.en: The shake-up aims to recast IBM as a federation of flexible and competing subsidiaries.
sentences.cn: 此次改组旨在将IBM重组为一个灵活且相互竞争的子公司联盟。
